Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2007 05:14AM Idamaria wrote: Thanks everyone for the thoughts advice and hugs. I am taking my Mom in for her chemo today her oncologist will be my dr. too so will ask him what he thinks about a mas vs lumpectomy. He is a geat Dr and I feel very confortable with him as he has been helping my Mom for the last 1 1/2 battle small cell lung cancer.
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed Idamaria Idamaria

Posts.Content: Idamaria wrote: I was just diagnosed last Wednsday with Grade 111 infitration ductal carcinoma looks like Medullary cancer Er & Pr neg. appears in Brac 1 mutations. Tumor size 1.3 cm Code: Go to meet surgeon again on Tuesday she said my choices are they need to remove another tumor, if that is cancer then I have to have masectomy or if not she will go in and remove more tissue on the tumor they already removed as I do not have clean margins and do the node removal at that time. The do not think they can do Sentinal node biospy as the tumor they removed last week interupted the lymph flow so Surgeon want to remove all lymph nodes under the are and one other tier of them at the time of surgery. I am scared but hopeful as if no lymph node involvement I will be at Stage one. My tumor grade was 111 so she said I will need chemo and radiation. Anmy suggestions for questions to the Dr on Tuesday. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed Idamaria Idamaria
